articles.title: Raspberry Robin Returns: New Malware Campaign Spreading Through WSF Files

articles.title: Researchers Uncover First Native Spectre v2 Exploit Against Linux Kernel

articles.title: Microsoft Fixes 149 Flaws in Huge April Patch Release, Zero-Days Included
